articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: As Lira Plunges, Bitcoin Interest Among Turkey's Poor Spikes - Decrypt
articles.description: As the Turkish lira hit today near historic lows, Turkey's Google searches for Bitcoin has reached "peaked popularity."
articles.content:
